snippet: The president signed the $956 billion farm bill after four years of debate in Congress over farm subsidies and Republican efforts to cut financing for food stamps.
abstract: Pres Obama signs the $956 billion farm bill at Michigan State University, where he extolls the benefits of a thriving agricultural sector for the nation’s overall economy.
lead_paragraph: The president signed the $956 billion farm bill after four years of debate in Congress over farm subsidies and Republican efforts to cut financing for food stamps.

headline.main: In Signing Farm Bill, Obama Extols Rural Growth
